mainProjects.name: Athlete Website
mainProjects.backsidetxt: This is my biggest (finished) Website-Project to date. It is a personal website for a long distance Runner for the purpose of showcasing competition achievements and record times.

mainProjects.name: Save the Sun
mainProjects.backsidetxt: This 2D puzzle platformer is my most successful mobile game to date. It has over 50k downloads and won the Google Play Award: Top 10 games of the month

mainProjects.name: Mission Drift: Lost Tracks
mainProjects.backsidetxt: Mission Drift: Lost Tracks is a driving game all about mastering the perfect drift. Explore a small open map with four unique biomes or race for the best time on four tracks. Slide through muddy forests, sandy deserts, icy lakes, and volcanic terrain. Customize your car with different paint and colors to make it your own!

mainProjects.name: Inaccurate Weather
mainProjects.backsidetxt: The World's Most Useless Weather App. Tired of apps that actually try to help you? Enter INacurate Weather — a completely pointless but beautifully designed app that delivers imaginary weather forecasts you don’t need. There are many extreme weather scenarios like 'Acid rain' or 'Cotton candy clouds'

mainProjects.name: Buxicution
mainProjects.backsidetxt: Buxicution is a fun little bullet-hell game. Bugs have taken over and are feasting on the energy of your computer. You - the friendly Energy ball, want to get that power back. In order to save all the energy, you start a BUXICUTION to execute them all.

mainProjects.name: Off the Path
mainProjects.backsidetxt: Off the path is a beautful relaxing storygame about a group of friends getting lost in the mountains. It was developed in Unreal Engine for a game jam.

projectsInDevelopment.name: This website ;)
projectsInDevelopment.backsidetxt: I am currently developing my personal website as a central hub to showcase my apps, games, and other programming projects in a more organized and accessible way. This will serve as a portfolio where I can share my work, updates, and future projects with a wider audience.

projectsInDevelopment.name: 3D Temple Game
projectsInDevelopment.backsidetxt: This game expands on the idea from 'Off the Path' adding a more complex gameplay loop, a fleshed-out story as well es a bigger world for the game to explore. Think of 'Off the Path' as the game's first concept, and this is the fully developed version.

projectsInDevelopment.name: Friendly Reminder
projectsInDevelopment.backsidetxt: This app, currently in development with Flutter, delivers a daily joke to users, allowing them to like, share, and create their own. The funniest joke of the day wins, making it a fun way to engage with the community and enjoy humor together.

sideProjects.name: Hotel Management Software
sideProjects.backsidetxt: Although the visual frontend of this project is well-polished, the primary focus was on the backend of web development, particularly PHP and database management with SQL. The project is a hotel management system that allows users to create profiles, make bookings, and manage reservations, while administrators have full control over data processing and management.

sideProjects.name: Edge & Color detection algorithm
sideProjects.backsidetxt: This Discord bot allows users to play Tic-Tac-Toe and Rock, Paper, Scissors directly within a server. It includes basic game logic, score tracking, and ensures smooth gameplay with real-time updates. Users can compete against the bot, and the scores are stored persistently. Perfect for adding fun and interactive elements to any Discord server!

sideProjects.name: To get Her
sideProjects.backsidetxt: 'To get HER' is a short stealth game set in some restaurants, where you play as a girl who trys to stay unseen, while completing the quest of stealing all the ingredients while staying hidden from the security guards.

sideProjects.name: Bero Chat
sideProjects.backsidetxt: This side project was my first hands-on experience with networking in Python. It includes a basic client-server setup along with a simple visual interface for a chat application. While it's a small step, it was a great way to explore real-time messaging and see networking concepts in action!

sideProjects.name: Mission Drift: Classic
sideProjects.backsidetxt: This game is the smaller version of 'Mission Drift: Lost Tracks'. Here you have one mission - To drift, slide your way across the map while destroying as many boxes as possible.
